pullrequest.title: Change equality helper to work with 387 fp unit

content.raw: The update to the PR uses an approach similar to the Atlas one, where volatile vars are used when the 387 fp coprocessor is detected.  I've pushed a minimal change that fixes the unit test failure I'm seeing on i686 - successful build log with the updated patch can be found [here](https://kojipkgs.fedoraproject.org//work/tasks/497/10980497/build.log)
